---
title: "MTA Subway Stations"
---

```{r include=FALSE}
stations <- utils::read.csv("../data/raw/MTA_Subway_Stations (1).csv")
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

stations_sf <- stations |> 
  mutate(geometry = st_as_sfc(Georeference)) |> 
  st_as_sf()

leaflet(stations_sf) |> 
  addTiles() |> 
  addMarkers()
```
